name: Shy Glizzy
description: '''Marquis Amonte King''' (born December 12, 1992), better known by his stage name '''Shy Glizzy''' (stylized as '''$hy Glizzy'''), is an American rapper from [[Southeast (Washington, D.C.)|Southeast]], [[Washington, D.C.]] He is best known for his guest appearance alongside [[Brent Faiyaz]] on [[GoldLink]]'s 2016 single "[[Crew (song)|Crew]]", which peaked at number 45 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] and was nominated for [[Best Rap/Sung Performance]] at the [[59th Annual Grammy Awards]].
